Name: Detect Dan The Dog!
About the game: Dan the Dog, has gone missing and its up to you to find him! Enter various different levels and search high and low, because he is really good at hiding. So good in fact that when ever you play a game he will hide at different spot from where he was last time! Press and hold the trigger buttons to activate you laser pointer, use the a buttons to teleport, and use your joysticks to rotate. Be sure to search near! Don't forget to look far! This is a great game for people new to Virtual Reality, Casual gamers, Senior citizens and may help them get accustomed to teleporting and using it to explore virtual reality worlds . Best of all Dan The Dog is SO CUTE!!!!!
